thread.title: 'Outstanding' A&E changes set-up to tackle busy winter
thread.title_full: 'Outstanding' A&E changes set-up to tackle busy winter

title: 'Outstanding' A&E changes set-up to tackle busy winter
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device 'Outstanding' A&E changes set-up to tackle busy winter 12 January 2017 Last updated at 00:08 GMT 
An "outstanding" A&E department has changed its set-up in order to get patients through the department more quickly. 
Patients are seen at The Royal Devon and Exeter Hospital by senior consultants almost immediately, to make sure they receive the best care. 
The hospital says this helps maintain a "safe flow of patients" during an "extremely busy" time of year. Related Topics
